remarks: A class equal to a bounded one is bounded.  Stated with a commuted (compared with ~ bdceqi ) equality in the hypothesis, to work better with definitions ( ` B ` is the definiendum that one wants to prove bounded; see comment of ~ bd0r ).  (Contributed by BJ, 3-Oct-2019.)
statement:
bdceqir.min $e |- Bdd_ A $.
bdceqir.maj $e |- B = A $.
bdceqir $p |- Bdd_ B $.
